summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackReveal smooth, glowing skin with this gentle Glycolic Exfoliating Toner from Good Molecules.
details: DetailsBenefitsGentle, fragrance-free formula supports skin's renewal process without dryness or irritation.VeganCruelty-FreeKey IngredientsGlycolic acid helps to exfoliate dead skin cells to reveal smoother, brighter skin.Galactomyces ferment, hyaluronic acid, and aloe help to hydrate and nourish skin.Item 2582410How To UseDispense a few drops into your hands or a cotton pad. Apply to skin after cleansing and before serums and moisturizers. Good Molecules recommends wearing SPF during the day when using this product.IngredientsWater, Dipropylene Glycol, Glycolic Acid, Propanediol, Sodium Citrate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Glycerin, Galactomyces Ferment Filtrate, Butylene Glycol, Salicylic Acid, Pentylene Glycol, Niacinamide, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Tricholoma Matsutake Extract, Ethylhexylglycerin, Rhododendron Chrysanthum Leaf Extract, Hydrolyzed Cicer Seed Extract, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Hyaluronic Acid.
how_to_use: Dispense a few drops into your hands or a cotton pad. Apply to skin after cleansing and before serums and moisturizers. Good Molecules recommends wearing SPF during the day when using this product.

reviews.headline: No acne to acne bumps all over
reviews.comments: Too irritating and I do not like the Galactomyces Ferment ingredient. Would not recommend

reviews.headline: Irritated right away
reviews.comments: Im not sure why it irritated me so fast. First time using it and felt little spikes on my skin, not for my skin .

reviews.headline: Great product!
reviews.comments: The best toner I've ever used! Cleans deep and cleans pores

reviews.headline: Absolutely amazing product
reviews.comments: I got this as a free gift from Ulta & im so glad i did. An absolutely amazing product!

reviews.headline: Basically water
reviews.comments: This exfoliating toner was a waste of money and time. Used it all up for nothing. Water would have probably been more effective.

reviews.headline: I Bought This Twice Now!
reviews.comments: I use this after I was my face and then apply my serum and day or night cream. Doesn't dry my skin and it seems to be helping with the texture as well. This is the only change I have made in my skin care, so it must be what's helping.

reviews.headline: Amazing!
reviews.comments: This product is everything I've hoped for! I've been using it consistently for about 6 months now and have noticed huge changes. It has helped brighten my skin and fade dark spots faster, it has also improved the bumps on arms and prevents ingrown hairs! Seriously great stuff, a little goes a long ways so you get your moneys worth.

reviews.headline: Game changer
reviews.comments: I literally ADORE this product!! It has changed my face in 2 months. I use it every night after cleansing my skin before bedtime. So gentle but effective at the same time-I can't recommend it enough! Pics from 10/24 vs 12/24

reviews.headline: Would definitely buy again
reviews.comments: Was looking for a cheap good product and I got exactly what I was looking for.

reviews.headline: I would buy again
reviews.comments: Someone recommended this product to me because i started to get a lot of hormonal acne mainly on my chin, so i went and got some and have been using it for about a week now and im already seeing a difference/improvement! I would recommend!

reviews.headline: Works great!
reviews.comments: I switched from the niacinamide toner to this one and saw a major difference after a few days. Improved texture and less breakouts. Gentle but effective exfoliant, and doesnt burn or irritate my skin. I'm on my 4th bottle!

reviews.headline: not sure about this one
reviews.comments: i received the toner as a GWP for a good molecules event. i wanted to try it out and i noticed it has unclogged my pores, but i havent noticed much else. ive only been using it for a few months and havent seen results. i do like that while it is an exfoliating toner, it is also gentle enough to use every day.

reviews.headline: Clearing face & body acne
reviews.comments: This toner has been so golden. I put this in a small spray bottle and put it on a cotton pad. I use it on my face 2-3 times a week (when needed) and i spray it on my chest / shoulder blade area and its helped a lot with acne. Including cystic acne. I would recommend this to anyone!!

reviews.headline: Good product, but have not seen results yet...
reviews.comments: I have now been using this in my skincare routine for around 5 months. I apply it at night after my face wash and before my moisturizer. It stings a little once put on, but only lasts a few seconds. It has not once caused any purging of my skin, or any sensitivity. Although I do like this addition to my regimen, I cannot tell a difference in if it is helping or not. I got it to help get rid of my pesky under skin clogged pores, hopefully it will help over time!

reviews.headline: Wanted to love it
reviews.comments: I bought this for the little bumps on my face but using it burned my face and irritated it more and I feel like I had more irritation bumps after. I went back to using their niacinamide toner.

reviews.headline: Bad reaction to product
reviews.comments: This toner does have good ingredients for the most part i usually go for products that are non comodogenic (does not clog your pores) in which this product is. I tried it in the morning just yesterday and i saw my pimples became red and other little spots were red but it never burned and when i washed my face at night my face was full of little red hives. i will definitely be returning this product today.

reviews.headline: Didn't do anything
reviews.comments: I used this product for months it did pretty much nothing. Its a good astringent but I think its too gentle for an exfoliant (which your supposed to use 2x per week not everyday). Might be good if you have sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: This toner saved my skin!
reviews.comments: I was having terrible breakouts for months and nothing helped until I tried this toner. When I use my RX treatments on their own: Nothing. When I use them with this toner: Clear skin.

reviews.headline: Alternative Use
reviews.comments: I actually dont use this on my face. I use this under my arms. It prevents them from getting stinky. They will still sweat but they will not stink. Ive been using this for so long under my arms. I like this brand because its gentle and not harsh. Everytine i get out of the shower and dry off i use this. Let it dry and put my regular deodorant on. Its so good for the summertime too. Being outside or in the water all day your deo tends to wear off. Now if it does im not insecure about it because i never stink. I just use deodorant for the antiperspirant factor to stay dry. Definitely love this stuff, just for different reasons lol

reviews.headline: Great for acne and texture
reviews.comments: I switched from the niacinamide toner to this one, a saw a HUGE difference in less than a week. I get really insecure about my bumpy, reptilian skin, but this toner really helped tone it down. I even got my dad (61) to start using it for his hyperpigmentation, and he loves it! Im prone to hormonal acne, but i havent had any major breakouts in the past 2 months

properties.name: Pros

values.label: Skin feels so smooth, reasonably priced

display_values: Skin feels so smooth, reasonably priced

media.headline: I notice a difference with this
media.caption: How the product dispenses

media.headline: I notice a difference with this
media.caption: What the bottle looks like

faceoff_positive.comments:
Did a trial of this product and someone else was right; it definitely had a painful burning sensation on my face BUT works AMAZING as a full body exfoliation step after the shower. Will never understand how some of y'all keep using a product that makes your face burn. If it burns that's not good! Doesn't mean the product is bad, it just wasn't right for your skin. Also, I feel like I should mention it, but avoid using it on your legs after shaving, save that for a non-shaving day.

My face prefers gentler formulations but I'm still in love and this is a great way to help prevent ingrown hairs, body acne, and foliculitus bumps. My skin is always so soft after using this and I use it about 1-3 times a week at most and I've noticed a marked decrease in issues with body acne, bumps, and ingrown hairs since I started using this.
faceoff_positive.headline: Fantastic toner but definitely do a test patch

faceoff_negative.comments: I had high hopes for this but it burned too badly to use. The burning was fairly intense and lasted and wouldn't stop. I had to rinse it off. I tried several times with it by itself to be sure and every time the burning was too intense. I can handle occasional use of The Ordinary's peel (the red one), it burns but not nearly as intensely as this. I'm sure it's a good product, but it was too painful for me. I only used about 5 drops for my whole face so I went lightly and it was still too much. It burned more than any product has in recent memory.
faceoff_negative.headline: Burns too badly to use.
